infos.value: And here we are, within the walls of Lykeros Castle.
Never would I have thought we could sneak in so easily...
You really are something.
Howlie's amazing!
Hahahaha. All part of being a gallant gentleman.
You certainly don't lack the gall to say so yourself...
Hey, Ty Ty. You didn't wanna come to the castle, huh.
So then why are you here?
Sh-shut up. I came because I'm worried about you all!
Are you too dim to see that!?
Ungh... You meanie!
W-wait, keep it down! They'll realize we're here!
Waaah...
...I'm sorry. I was out of line, Chel...
You're forgiven!
Alright, now that we've all made up...shall we move on?
Yeah, let's go!
But Brother...you have no idea where in the castle Luartha is being held captive, am I wrong?
You don’t know, eh?
Huh... And you do?
It's this way.
...How do you know that?
If it's a castle, it has a dungeon.
And if a princess is being held captive anywhere, it would be there.
...He can’t be serious.
